type.description: The type of product bought, for example, a physical or a digital product.

name.description: A description of the order line.

quantity.description: The number of items in the order line.

vatRate.description: The VAT rate applied to the order line.

sku.description: The SKU, EAN, ISBN or UPC of the product sold.

imageUrl.description: A link pointing to an image of the product sold.

productUrl.description: A link pointing to the product page in your web shop of the product sold.

metadata.description: Provide any data you like, for example a string or a JSON object.
